metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16427 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Various out of bounds reads when handling responses in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to potentially crash the opensc library using programs.

criterions.comment: opensc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
